scenes.description: Nerissa presents her 3D debut merchandise: a paper knife based on her microphone design.
Fuwawa presents her 3D debut merchandise: a fluffy tail keychain.
Mococo presents her 3D debut merchandise: her own version of the tail keychain.
Nerissa presents the Pokey Hand In Cushion merch.
Shiori presents the Advent 3D Acrylic Stands featuring their 3D poses.
Advent members share their final thoughts and messages of gratitude to their fans at the end of the 3D collab stream.

subtitles.original:
Nerissa Ravencroft
Paper Knife
subtitles.english:
Nerissa Ravencroft
Paper Knife

subtitles.original: If you like to cut open letters or you just like to cut open things that are paper...
subtitles.english: If you like to cut open letters or you just like to cut open things that are paper...

subtitles.original:
ネリッサ・レイヴンクロフト
ペーパーナイフ
subtitles.english:
Nerissa Ravencroft
Paper Knife

subtitles.original: this, based on my microphone design, is going to be perfect for all those sorts of needs.
subtitles.english: this, based on my microphone design, is going to be perfect for all those sorts of needs.

subtitles.original: So please consider buying it if you like my weapon design.
subtitles.english: So please consider buying it if you like my weapon design.

subtitles.original: And 次は...
subtitles.english: And next...

subtitles.original:
Fuwawa Abyssgard
Fuwawa's Tail Keychain
subtitles.english:
Fuwawa Abyssgard
Fuwawa's Tail Keychain

subtitles.original: Hi! Fuwawa!
subtitles.english: Hi! Fuwawa!

subtitles.original: I have a very fluffy tail holder for you!
subtitles.english: I have a very fluffy tail holder for you!

subtitles.original: So everywhere you go, I'll be shaking my tail...
subtitles.english: So everywhere you go, I'll be shaking my tail...

subtitles.original: ...and I'll be fluffy forever! Bau bau!
subtitles.english: ...and I'll be fluffy forever! Bau bau!

subtitles.original: Bau bau! And 次は...
subtitles.english: Bau bau! And next...

subtitles.original:
Mococo Abyssgard
Mococo's Tail Keychain
subtitles.english:
Mococo Abyssgard
Mococo's Tail Keychain

subtitles.original: And next, we have Mococo!
subtitles.english: And next, we have Mococo!

subtitles.original: Keyholder with my tail! I'm a tail!
subtitles.english: Keyholder with my tail! I'm a tail!

subtitles.original: Yeah, I'll be with you everywhere, okay?
subtitles.english: Yeah, I'll be with you everywhere, okay?

subtitles.original: Everywhere! Yeah!
subtitles.english: Everywhere! Yeah!

subtitles.original: And next...
subtitles.english: And next...

subtitles.original: Pokey Hand In Cushion
subtitles.english: Pokey Hand In Cushion

subtitles.original: Next we have, as you met today, Pokey, our cute mascot for all of Advent and the Advent-trix.
subtitles.english: Next we have, as you met today, Pokey, our cute mascot for all of Advent and the Advent-trix.

subtitles.original: It is a hand cushion. So if your hands are cold, you can warm them up...
subtitles.english: It is a hand cushion. So if your hands are cold, you can warm them up...

subtitles.original: ...or if you're taking a nap, you can lay on it.
subtitles.english: ...or if you're taking a nap, you can lay on it.

subtitles.original: It's perfect for all sorts of pillowy transportation needs.
subtitles.english: It's perfect for all sorts of pillowy transportation needs.

subtitles.original: So do consider getting your own Pokey and beat him up!
subtitles.english: So do consider getting your own Pokey and beat him up!

subtitles.original: Don't beat him up!
subtitles.english: Don't beat him up!

subtitles.original: 3D Acrylic Stand
subtitles.english: 3D Acrylic Stand

subtitles.original: And finally, Advent 3D Acrylic Stand! That's triple the Ds!
subtitles.english: And finally, Advent 3D Acrylic Stand! That's triple the Ds!

subtitles.original: These acrylic stands, they're special because they have our 3D pose!
subtitles.english: These acrylic stands, they're special because they have our 3D pose!

subtitles.original: They're big! Posing!
subtitles.english: They're big! Posing!

subtitles.original: Yeah, you need to get your paws on it, okay? Yeah! Bau bau!
subtitles.english: Yeah, you need to get your paws on it, okay? Yeah! Bau bau!

subtitles.original: Now, the merch cart will be open after the stream, so get them ASAP!
subtitles.english: Now, the merch cart will be open after the stream, so get them ASAP!

subtitles.original: ASAP! Right now! It is your chance! Now! Yes!
subtitles.english: ASAP! Right now! It is your chance! Now! Yes!

subtitles.original: How often are you going to be able to get our 3D debut merch? Not often, I think.
subtitles.english: How often are you going to be able to get our 3D debut merch? Not often, I think.

subtitles.original: So don't miss out on it, because I'm pretty sure it's limited, right?
subtitles.english: So don't miss out on it, because I'm pretty sure it's limited, right?

subtitles.original: It's in 3D! Triple D! It's the time! Now's the time!
subtitles.english: It's in 3D! Triple D! It's the time! Now's the time!

subtitles.original: Now do we have any messages for everyone?
subtitles.english: Now do we have any messages for everyone?

subtitles.original: I just wanted to say thank you so much to all the Advent-trix for making this dream of ours come true!
subtitles.english: I just wanted to say thank you so much to all the Advent-trix for making this dream of ours come true!

subtitles.original: Bau bau, thank you!
subtitles.english: Bau bau, thank you!

subtitles.original: And as for me, I just want to say thank you for supporting us and helping me not die!
subtitles.english: And as for me, I just want to say thank you for supporting us and helping me not die!

subtitles.original: So yeah! I don't feel shaky anymore! Whoo!
subtitles.english: So yeah! I don't feel shaky anymore! Whoo!

subtitles.original: Seriously, without all of your guy's love and support, we wouldn't be able to be standing on this stage today.
subtitles.english: Seriously, without all of your guy's love and support, we wouldn't be able to be standing on this stage today.

subtitles.original: So thank you for loving us, thank you for loving me, thank you for loving Advent and hololive and for being here today for our special first 3D collaboration.
subtitles.english: So thank you for loving us, thank you for loving me, thank you for loving Advent and hololive and for being here today for our special first 3D collaboration.

subtitles.original: And Mococo... I'm a bit nervous, but... thank you from the bottom of my heart, thank you so much.
subtitles.english: And Mococo... I'm a bit nervous, but... thank you from the bottom of my heart, thank you so much.

subtitles.original: You know we really couldn't do it without you. And I really hope that you'll think that 'Wow, I really like Advent, I like them even more after today!'
subtitles.english: You know we really couldn't do it without you. And I really hope that you'll think that 'Wow, I really like Advent, I like them even more after today!'

subtitles.original: So please continue to support us and we'll do our best, okay? Bau bau!
subtitles.english: So please continue to support us and we'll do our best, okay? Bau bau!

subtitles.original: And last but not least... Watch out Advent-trix, Advent's at full power now, we're in 3D!
subtitles.english: And last but not least... Watch out Advent-trix, Advent's at full power now, we're in 3D!

subtitles.original: It's not the end, it's just the beginning. So please keep supporting us, okay? Thank you everyone!
subtitles.english: It's not the end, it's just the beginning. So please keep supporting us, okay? Thank you everyone!

subtitles.original: Thank you, thank you! I hope you had an amazing time today!
subtitles.english: Thank you, thank you! I hope you had an amazing time today!

subtitles.original: Keep smiling! This was hololive English -Advent-!
subtitles.english: Keep smiling! This was hololive English -Advent-!

subtitles.original: Bye-bye darlings! Bau bau! Bau bau bau!
subtitles.english: Bye-bye darlings! Bau bau! Bau bau bau!
